title: 「Anglosphere」山姆叔叔：联合国倘不堪用，废之！ ⊙０⊙ （第三集）
contents:
先来个预告：9月20日或者更早，这一出戏将出现高潮。

先来看看彭佩奥的话：
https://twitter.com/SecPompeo/status/1298991873822883848
Last week, the U.S. triggered the 30-day process to restore virtually all
@UN sanctions on Iran after the Security Council failed to uphold its mission to maintain international peace and security. These sanctions will snap back at midnight GMT on September 20.
2:32 PM · Aug 27, 2020

上周，在安理会不能继续其维护国际和平与安全之使命的情况下，美国启动了限期30天对伊朗恢复所有联合国制裁的流程。所有制裁，将在9月20日GMT时间的午夜恢复。
2:32 PM · Aug 27, 2020


https://twitter.com/SecPompeo/status/1299051242379972610
The one-sided nuclear deal didn’t bring security for America, stability in the Middle East, or a change in the regime’s behavior – it never will. Re-establishing the @UN Arms Embargo on Iran puts pressure Iran to behave like a normal country and come back to the bargaining table.
6:28 PM · Aug 27, 2020

一面倒的核协议没有给美国带来安全，没有给中东带去稳定，或者改变伊朗政权的行为——永远不可能。重建联合国对伊朗的武器禁运，才能给伊朗压力，让其表现得像正常国家，并回到谈判桌。
6:28 PM · Aug 27, 2020


在8月27日，土耳其一媒体报道了周二的美国驻联合国特使的话：（可顺便参考第二集布理安-胡克所说的「中英法俄失职」：https://pincong.rocks/article/23351。基本可以肯定，美国这次是认真的，因为和自己性命攸关）
Speaking during Tuesday's virtual council session, US envoy Kelly Craft said "it is Russia and China that revel in this council's dysfunction and failure."

"It is Iran who celebrates its newfound leverage over the free nations of the world," she said. "I only regret that other members of this council have lost their way, and now find themselves standing in the company of terrorists."


没什么好解释的，懂的自然懂。

基本上，这事给人一种表面印象，即美国一意孤行：错的不是我，是世界。

但是，和可以天天叫嚣这句话，或者表演这种逻辑的中国人相比，美国人是不同的。

至于有多不同，真想知道的，就接下来几周好好欣赏吧。
